title: Friendly Vegetarian Food Stall
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Pizza, Chinese, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Singaporean
description: 善缘素食 veggie food stall in Bukit Merah Food Centre serving a variety of dishes such as wonton noodles, hor fun, crispy noodles, fried rice, mee goreng, sliced fish bee hoon, laksa, spaghetti, and pizza.
streetAddress: Jalan Bukit Merah Market & Food Centre Blk 112 #01-13
